name: mrnoplay
author: Tianze Ds Qiu (slaaker@126.com)
description: Give an end to no-end rests and play times.

scripts.electron-mac: nbns && vue-cli-service build --mode electron && npx cap copy && cd electron && yarn run m && cd ../
scripts.electron-win: nbns && vue-cli-service build --mode electron && npx cap copy && cd electron && yarn run electron:win && cd ../
scripts.electron-dev: nbns && vue-cli-service build --mode electron && npx cap copy && cd electron && yarn run e && cd ../
scripts.capacitor-android: nbns && vue-cli-service build --mode capacitor && npx cap copy && cd android && npx cap open android && cd ../
scripts.web: nbns && vue-cli-service build --mode web && cp -r -f www/ ../mrnoplay.web/

manifest.en: Float Window and Allow Getting More Time
manifest.zh: 完成了计时界面浮窗，工作模式允许用户增加时间
